Package jason.asSemantics

Class Intention

  • java.lang.Object
    • jason.asSemantics.Intention
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Intention>, java.lang.Iterable<IntendedMeans>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    fork.ForkIntention
    public class Intention
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Intention>, java.lang.Iterable<IntendedMeans>
    Represents and Intention (a stack of IntendedMeans). The comparable sorts the intentions based on the atomic property: atomic intentions comes first.
    Author:
    Jomi and Rafael
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
